pluginstrument.author: Simstrumentation & Russ Barlow
pluginstrument.description:
CIRRUS SF50 VISION JET SWITCH PANEL
Made by SIMSTRUMENTATION : https://simstrumentation.com
Version info: - **v1.1** - 2022-12- - Graphics update - Added backlighting - **v1.0** - 2022-12-11 - Original release
NOTES: - BONUS FEATURE! Touching the hex screw to the left of the panel will remove all the aircraft covers and put on your headphones so you don't have to do it from the VAMS menu in the GTC580 - Panel knob will adjust backlighting of this panel and all other Vision Jet - specific instruments in this collection - Since the GTC580 and G3000 bezels are NOT specific to this plane, but rather GENERIC instruments, the panel dimmer will not affect their backlighting brightness.
